titleStmt.title: R. Higgins to George W. Johnson
CWG14402

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

body.p: Take notice that on July 10. 1861 I will at the County Clerks Office in the town of Helena, Ark. take the depositions of various persons to be used as evidence by me in the suit in the Scott Circuit Court wherein I am Pltff. & you are Deft. between the hours of 6 A. M. & 6 P M and continue from day to day if necessary to complete the same.

R Higgins
Notice to take depositions
July 10 1861
